results.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Made $70K Betting Against 'Crazy Mode' on Polymarket
results.description: The Ethereum founder claims his strategy of betting against extreme market sentiment "usually makes money" on Polymarket.

results.title: Bitcoin sell-off pushes IBIT investor returns into the red — asset manager
results.description: Based on dollar-weighted flows, aggregate returns for investors in BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin Trust have turned negative following Bitcoin’s recent sell-off.

results.title: Alternative inflation data shows sharp cooling in US CPI amid Fed uncertainty
results.description: Real-time Truflation data show US price pressures easing, a shift that could reshape expectations for Fed policy and influence cryptocurrency and risk-asset markets.

results.title: Bitcoin price forecasts tap sub-$50K levels as BTC copies old bear markets
results.description: Bitcoin bear market history was "repeating," said BTC price analysis after key support failed and realized price flipped to new resistance.

results.description: February is packed with high-profile releases, led by Japanese developers and bolstered by new Switch 2 exclusives and long-awaited revivals.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: UAE firm bought 49% of Trump-linked crypto startup for $500M: WSJ
results.description: An Abu Dhabi investment vehicle backed by Sheikh Tahnoon bin Zayed Al Nahyan, the UAE’s national security adviser, agreed to buy 49% of World Liberty Financial for $500M.

results.title: Step Finance treasury wallets breached, $27M in SOL drained as STEP crashes 90%
results.description: Solana-based DeFi platform Step Finance disclosed a treasury wallet breach that saw over $27 million in SOL moved onchain, sending its STEP token down more than 90%.

results.title: Sam Bankman-Fried ramps up Trump support following Ellison’s release
results.description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried said in a series of recent X posts that US President Donald Trump was “right on crypto,” while Joe Biden “bungled crypto.”

results.title: Bitcoin’s price may have seen ‘deepest pullback’ at $77K: Analyst
results.description: Bitcoin advocate and accountant Rajat Soni warned, “Never trust a weekend pump or dump,” as Bitcoin plunged and over $2 billion was wiped from the crypto market.

results.title: SOL sinks to April 2025 lows as Bitcoin, AI stocks and metals unwind
results.description: SOL falls to lows not seen since April 2025, but Solana’s price-to-fundamentals gap and its wider correlation to macro markets may provide hope for investors.

results.description: Bitcoin Magazine El Salvador’s Bitcoin Beach Hosts Global Summit: Strategies for Sustainable Bitcoin Circular Economies Emerge The invite-only Bitcoin Circular Economy Summit in El Zonte drew representatives from 29 countries, spotlighting concentrated adoption, high-trust teams, and Bitcoin-only focus for lasting impact in failing-currency regions. results.title: Bitcoin crashes below $76K Strategy cost basis in $2B market-wide liquidation event

results.title: India Faces Pressure to Rethink Crypto Taxes Ahead of Union Budget as Trading Shifts Offshore
results.description: Industry leaders are pushing for tax reform as traders flee offshore, draining domestic exchanges and undermining regulatory oversight.

results.title: Bitcoin Mining Profits Hit 14-Month Low After Winter Storm Rocks Miners: CryptoQuant
results.description: Bitcoin miners are "extremely underpaid" given the price of Bitcoin and current BTC mining conditions, according to a CryptoQuant report.

results.title: Tennessee Lawmakers To Weigh Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill

results.title: Gold Is the Real Bubble, Says Ark Invest's Cathie Wood—Not AI
results.description: Tech investor Cathie Wood isn't worried about an AI bubble, instead singling out gold as the real ongoing asset bubble.

results.title: Binance to Move $1 Billion User Protection Fund Into Bitcoin
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Binance to Move $1 Billion User Protection Fund Into Bitcoin As the bitcoin price slumps, Binance said it will convert the $1 billion stablecoin-backed Secure Asset Fund for Users entirely into bitcoin over the next 30 days.
